gates module

Gates script:

  • Provides a class of standard gates for 1 and 2 qubits.

  • Allows for custom gate creation, and scales to unitary if necessary.

  • Allows for controlled-gate for any gate.

  • Can perform tensor product of gates.

Dependencies:

  • numpy

Built-in 1 qubit gates:

  • X_gate: X gate.

  • Y_gate: Y gate.

  • Z_gate: Z gate.

  • H_gate: Hadamard gate.

  • S_gate: S gate.

  • T_gate: T gate.

Built-in 2 qubit gates:

  • CNOT_gate2(control): CNOT gate with specified control.

  • SWAP_gate2: SWAP gate.

  • HH_gate2: double Hadamard gate (Hadamard on each qubit).

  • FT_gate2: Quantum Fourier Transform gate on 2 qubits.

Example for calling gates:

x = gates.X_gate # produces instance of an X gate. cnot1 = gates.CNOT_gate2(1) # produces instance of a CNOT gate with control on the first qubit.

class gates.CNOTGate2(control)

Bases: Gate

CNOT gate for 2 qubit systems, with the control from specified qubit. This is equivalent to “controlled_gate2(X_gate, control)”.

control

if 1, the control is the first qubit. If 2, the control is the second qubit.

Type:

int

get_control()
Returns:

the position of the control qubit (1 or 2).

Return type:

int

class gates.ControlledGate2(control, gate1)

Bases: Gate

Controlled gate (custom) for 2 qubit systems, with the control from specified qubit.

gate

must be a 1-qubit gate.

Type:

Gate

control

if 1, the control is the first qubit. If 2, the control is the second qubit.

Type:

int

get_control()
Returns:

the position of the control qubit (1 or 2).

Return type:

int

get_target_gate()
Returns:

the target gate used in the control gate.

Return type:

Gate

class gates.FTGate2

Bases: Gate

Initiates a Quantum Fourier Transform gate.

Parameters:

None.

class gates.Gate(num_qubits, array)

Bases: object

The Gate object is an n-qubit gate represented in the standard basis.

num_qubits

The number of qubits that pass through the gate,

Type:

int

array

2^n by 2^n array representing the gate.

Type:

ndarray

get_array()

Reads the gate in matrix form.

Returns:

copy of gate array

Return type:

ndarray

get_num_qubits()

Reads the number of qubits that pass through the gate.

Returns:

number of qubits

Return type:

int

class gates.HGate

Bases: Gate

Initiates a Hadamard gate.

Parameters:

None.

class gates.HHGate2

Bases: Gate

Initiates a HxH gate.

Parameters:

None.

class gates.PhaseGate(phase)

Bases: Gate

Phase gate from a given input phase. Sign convention: |1> -> exp(+j*phase) |1>.

phase

The phase of the phase gate.

Type:

float

get_phase()
Returns:

the phase of the phase gate.

Return type:

float

set_phase(new_phase)

Sets a new phase for the phase gate (e.g. for a phase gate with a variable input phase).

Parameters:

new_phase (float) – The new phase for the phase gate.

class gates.RotationGate(rot1, rot2, rot3)

Bases: Gate

Initiates a general rotation using the Euler angles.

rot1

first Euler angle, rotates around the Z axis;

Type:

float

rot2

second Euler angle, rotates around the X axis;

Type:

float

rot3

third Euler angle, rotates around the Z axis.

Type:

flat

get_angle()

Gives the angle of the rotation ‘rot{rotation_number}’, where the number designates which rotation this is.

Parameters:

number (int) – number of rotation angle called.

Returns:

rotation angle.

Return type:

float

class gates.SGate

Bases: Gate

Initiates an S gate.

Parameters:

None.

class gates.SWAPGate2

Bases: Gate

Initiates a SWAP gate for 2 qubits.

Parameters:

None.

class gates.TGate

Bases: Gate

Initiates a T gate.

Parameters:

None.

class gates.XGate

Bases: Gate

Initiates an X gate.

Parameters:

None.

class gates.YGate

Bases: Gate

Initiates a Y gate.

Parameters:

None.

class gates.ZGate

Bases: Gate

Initiates a Z gate.

Parameters:

None.

gates.create_gate(num_qubits, array)

Creates a customised gate U. It needs to be unitary or scalable to unitary, in which case it is automatically scaled to a unitary matrix.

Parameters:

  • num_qubits (int) – the number of qubits that pass through the gate,

  • array (array_like) – A 2^n by 2^n array of floats, where n = num_qubits (int) is the number of qubits.

Returns:

the custom gate.

Return type:

Gate

gates.tensorprod(gate_list)

Calculates the tensor product of gates from a list.

Parameters:

gate_list (list) – list of Gate objects

Returns:

resulting gate

Return type:

Gate
